defendants.name: Officer James Brown
defendants.role_title: police officer with Tampa Police Department

facts.event: Officer Brown approached John Smith during a routine traffic stop. Smith was cooperative and complied with all instructions.
Without provocation, Officer Brown forcefully removed Smith from the vehicle, slammed him against the hood, and applied a chokehold for approximately 30 seconds despite Smith not resisting
facts.harm: Smith suffered a fractured wrist, cervical spine strain, and bruising to his face and torso
documents: Medical records from Tampa General Hospital

facts.event: Smith was arrested and charged with resisting arrest without violence. The charges were later dropped by the State Attorney
facts.harm: Smith was detained for 18 hours. He suffered emotional distress, anxiety, and lost wages from missing work

facts.event: Tampa Police Department has a pattern and practice of excessive force. Multiple prior complaints filed against Officer Brown for similar conduct. Internal affairs found policy violations in 3 prior incidents but took no corrective action.

goals.primary: Obtain compensation for injuries and policy change
